title: Complex Tangent Function
description: CTAN calculates the tangent of a complex number
name: CTAN

input.name: X
input.description: A complex number for which the tangent is to be calculated.

output.name: CTAN
output.description: The complex tangent of the input number X.

return_value.description: The return value is the complex tangent of the input complex number X.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the complex tangent result.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the complex tangent result.
